debug_text.text: 'cool new test station in my log ' + $CoolNewTest.{$stations}.knownname
'cool new test station in my log ' + $CoolNewTest.{$stations}.productions
'cool new test station in my log ' + $CoolNewTest.{$stations}.controlposts.all
'cool new test station in my log ' + $CoolNewTest.{$stations}.controlposts.free
'cool new test station in my log ' + $CoolNewTest.{$stations}.zone.position

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'X marks the spot in %1 at position x=%2 y=%3 z=%4\n'.[$Crate.sector.name, $Crate.zone.position.x, $Crate.zone.position.y, $Crate.zone.position.z]

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'Stolen blueprints left behind in %1 at position x=%2 y=%3 z=%4\n'.[$Crate.sector.name, $Crate.zone.position.x, $Crate.zone.position.y, $Crate.zone.position.z]

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'Save the stranded crew in %1 at position x=%2 y=%3 z=%4\n'.[$Crate.sector.name, $Crate.zone.position.x, $Crate.zone.position.y, $Crate.zone.position.z]

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'Look for abandoned ships in %1 at position x=%2 y=%3 z=%4\n'.[$Crate.{1}.sector.name, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.x, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.y, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.z]

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'The enemy of your enemy is your friend - you have freed a prisoner of your enemy. They are now a member of your crew.\n'

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'Unknown Sector Discovered. You can now visit %1\n'.[$SectorGroupRandom.{1}.name]

set_value.name: $textBody
set_value.exact: 'Pirate hideout discovered in %1 at position x=%2 y=%3 z=%4\n'.[$Crate.{1}.sector.name, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.x, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.y, $Crate.{1}.zone.position.z]
